caption:
“Holiness begins in hiddenness.”

Reflection:
The unseen roots of virtue feed the visible bloom. What grows in silence shapes eternity.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that spiritual depth is cultivated in private — in prayer, patience, and unseen acts of love.
